r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Added support for phd:chunk="false" attribute on chunks. (Christian) - Added Turkish support for CHM. (Nilgun) - Added option (-L/--lang language) to use for CHM headers. (Hannes) - Added support for orderedlist numeration. (Hannes) - Added fallback to PHP_Compat getopt() on Windows. (Christian) - Added anchors for tips, warnings, important and notes. (Nilgun) - <interfacename> now automagically links to interfaces. (Hannes) - Automatically use the phpdoc configure.php generated version information file if it exists. (Hannes) - Removed default border for formal tables. (Philip)
